mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (senderUname, toUname, chatContext, mCheck, sendDate) VALUES (#{senderUname}, #{toUname}, #{chatContext}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select senderUname, toUname, chatContext, mCheck, sendDate from chat where (senderUname=#{senderUname} and toUname=#{toUname}) or (senderUname=#{toUname} and toUname=#{senderUname}) order by sendDate
